title: Yaatra
description: Yaatra is a travel platform with features like destination filters, interactive maps, and secure login/signup functionality.
Users can add and explore travel listings.
Integrated Google Maps API for interactive travel routes, geolocation, and real-time destination data.
Developed a scalable backend using Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB; implemented session management with JWT and bcrypt.
Added advanced filter functionality to enhance user navigation and improve overall UX

title: CodeX
description: full-stack EdTech platform give interaction between students and instructors.
Built using React, Redux, Node.js, and Express.
Educators can share content and manage learning materials.
Responsive UI for students and teachers.
Integrated Razorpay for payment processing and Cloudinary for media upload and storage.
Implemented email-based OTP verification using Nodemailer and React OTP; real-time notifications via Hot Toast.

title: My Portfolio
description: Personal portfolio showcasing my web development skills and project work..
Built using React and styled with CSS.
Includes sections like About, Skills, Projects, and Contact.
Fully responsive and mobile-friendly design also with interactive animations and clean, minimalist UI.
